question: The output of a full subtractor is same as the output of
_________________ can be used to implement the full subtractor.

answers.a: Two half subtractors and an OR gate
answers.b: Two XOR and an OR gates
answers.c: Two multiplexers and an AND gate
answers.d: Two comparators and an AND gate
